column4: can anyone help my. I have problems trying using skype. The sound it's to bad
A lot of skype sound quality issues are related to your internet connection. Are there any clues is related to your ubuntu configuration?
my internet connection it's right. On my another partition I don't have problems
So what exactly is the problem? Any sound at all? Cutting out? Happing in any other programs?
when i install my ubuntu, I was can't listen anything, so I was install sudo apt-get install linux-backports-modules-alsa-karmic-generic
I listen broken, and my friend listen to my broken. That's all
do you have any idea ti fix my audio problem?
So you don't have any working sound, but you have a second ubuntu install on an another partition that works fine?
summarizing, I can not understand what they tell me my contacts and the can't understandme
I can listen with mplayer and totem
In that case, its not likely to be a probelm with your sound configuration. Can you hear anything at all, or is it just really bad quality?
I hace a win7 partition where I can use skype (and other pc with ubuntu). But with this laptop (hp pavilion) I have the problem
it's extrange. Some time I can listen, and sometime no. Now I cant use totem or maplayer.
Does it say anything when you start totem, or do you just have no sound?
mplayer and totem don't run. mplayer says "MPlayer interrupted by signal 2 in module: play_audio"
It's posible return to original configuration or something?
you can kind of revert to default settings by doing an apt-get purge of ny troublesome software and reinstalling, but im not sure what you would want to reinstall
